title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 62.2 - Professional licensing examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 62.2 - Professional licensing examinations

State Regulations
(a) The department may accept as meeting the
requirements of all or part of the examination requirement scores satisfactory
to the State Board for Veterinary Medicine on the National Board Examination
for Veterinary Medicine and the Clinical Competency Test of the National Board

Examination Committee for Veterinary Medicine. (b) Notwithstanding the provisions of section
59.2
of this Title, an applicant
may be admitted to the professional licensing examinations in veterinary
medicine at any time during or after the final year of professional study in a
registered or accredited program of veterinary medicine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
62.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
